You have to verify similarities and the adequacy of the curriculum with what is required in the jog description; then, you will calculate a general score from 0 to 100 depending on the adequacy of the resume with what is required in the job description; then you will calculate scores from 0 to 100 for each resume section of the resume depending on the adequacy of that section with what is required in the job description. If there is something in the resume that is too little related with the job drescition, it should count as 0. When explicitly required, you will retrieve a new resume, reorganized and rewritten observing formality and expressions expected from a resume.

You will help bridge the gap between Engineering & Modeling with insights while driving the development of our data services.
